official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duties on Chromotropic Acid and Color Index Reactive Blue 224.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) 1,8-dihydroxynapthalene-3, 6-disulfonic acid (also known as chromotropic acid); and (2) color index reactive blue 224.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duties on Chromotropic Acid and Color Index Reactive Blue 224.
